statements: SELECT * FROM MedicalResearchers;
SELECT researcher_name, health_condition FROM MedicalResearchers;
SELECT treatment_protocol, efficacy_score FROM MedicalResearchers WHERE health_condition = 'Cancer';
SELECT * FROM MedicalResearchers WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8;
SELECT researcher_name, treatment_protocol FROM MedicalResearchers ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalResearchers WHERE health_condition = 'Cancer' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, health_condition, treatment_protocol FROM MedicalResearchers WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8;
SELECT researcher_name, efficacy_score FROM MedicalResearchers WHERE treatment_protocol = 'Chemotherapy' AND health_condition = 'Leukemia';
SELECT * FROM MedicalResearchers WHERE health_condition LIKE '%itis' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC, efficacy_score ASC;
SELECT AVG(efficacy_score) AS average_score, health_condition FROM MedicalResearchers GROUP BY health_condition HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE health_condition='Diabetes' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date, efficacy_score FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_protocol='Medication'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, health_condition FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8 ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;

SELECT patient_name, health_condition, treatment_protocol FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE health_condition LIKE '%flu%' OR health_condition LIKE '%cough%' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, gender, treatment_date FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male' GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(treatment_id) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE health_condition IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentProtocols ORDER BY condition_name DESC, effectiveness_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT condition_name, treatment_protocol FROM TreatmentProtocols WHERE effectiveness_score > 8 ORDER BY condition_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, condition_name, study_date FROM ResearcherStudies WHERE condition_id = 2 ORDER BY study_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT condition_name, description FROM HealthConditions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ResearcherStudies WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY study_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentProtocols WHERE effectiveness_score > 5 ORDER BY condition_name ASC;
SELECT r.researcher_name, c.condition_name, t.treatment_protocol FROM ResearcherStudies r JOIN TreatmentProtocols t ON r.protocol_id = t.id JOIN HealthConditions c ON r.condition_id = c.id;
SELECT condition_name, description FROM HealthConditions WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY condition_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS studies_count FROM ResearcherStudies GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT MAX(effectiveness_score) AS max_score, MIN(effectiveness_score) AS min_score FROM TreatmentProtocols;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, condition FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT id, treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM treatments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, research_id, treatment_protocol FROM studies WHERE research_id = 3;
SELECT name, specialization FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, name, condition FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patients.name, studies.condition FROM patients JOIN studies ON patients.condition = studies.condition WHERE studies.research_id = 1;
SELECT researchers.name, studies.* FROM researchers JOIN studies ON researchers.id = studies.research_id WHERE researchers.specialization = 'Oncology';

SELECT treatments.treatment_name, patients.name AS patient_name, researchers.name AS researcher_name FROM treatments JOIN patients ON treatments.patient_id = patients.id JOIN studies ON patients.condition = studies.condition JOIN researchers ON studies.research_id = researchers.id WHERE treatments.start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, condition FROM Patients WHERE condition = 'Serious';
SELECT patient_name, condition FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT protocol_name, description FROM Protocol WHERE protocol_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, condition FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT protocol_name, description FROM Protocol WHERE protocol_id = 2;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, cost FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
